original_text: And immediately the king sent an executioner, and commanded his head to be brought: and he went and beheaded him in the prison,
korean_text: 왕이 곧 시위병 하나를 보내어 요한의 머리를 가져오라 명하니 그 사람이 나가 옥에서 요한을 목 베어

sentences.original_text: And immediately the king sent an executioner
and commanded his head to be brought
and he went and beheaded him in the prison
